lpage.title: Web For You For Less
lpage.text: Fabulous Websites at a fraction of the cost!
lpage.mission: Web4U4Less is a Austin Texas base Web development, hosting, and consultancy. Our mission is to provide great websites at a reasonable cost for small businesses.

sections.name: about
sections.header: Built with Love (and Bootstrap if you want it)
sections.text: We support our customers in creating, hosting, and advertsing their websites. Working out of Round Rock Texas, we collaborate with you to create and maintain a stunning interactive website that looks as good on your phone as it does on your laptop.

projects.text: Fill out a simple set of information and immediately see how it will display in a variety of formats.
We can match your website with an equally stunning self contained mobile app.

projects.header: Web Hosting with Mail and Data Storage
projects.text: We Host you Web and provide email that match your website address.

sections.name: signup
sections.header: Subscribe to receive news, coupons and advice.

items.title: Address
items.value: 609 S Lake Creek Drive, Round Rock, Texas 78681
